doc:
John G. Adolfi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_G._Adolfi 0 John Gustav Adolfi (February 19, 1888 – May 11, 1933) was an American silent film director, actor, and screenwriter who was involved in more than 100 productions throughout his career. An early acting credit was in the recently restored 1912 film Robin Hood. John_Gustav_Adolfi ( February_19_,_1888 – May_11_,_1933 ) was an_American_silent_film_director , actor , and screenwriter who was involved in more_than_100_productions throughout his_career . An_early_acting_credit was in the_recently_restored_1912_film_Robin_Hood .
